title: The Infowarrior - Featuring Jason Bermas-6-18-09.Commercial Free
description:
The Info Warrior Show with Jason Bermas June 18th,2009 from prisonplanet.tv - Commercial free. 64Kbps.mp3

Gary Franchi of Restore The Republic and William Lewis(producer of the films "In Plain Sight" and "Life on the Edge of a Bubble - Blowing the American Dream") appear live in studio with jason in the first hour.  In the second hour, author and peace activist Sander Hicks joins Jason to discuss the ballot initiative in New York for a new investigation into the events of 9/11.  In hour 3, Jason talks with Gary Talis of wearechange.org regarding the status of Gary's fraudulent arrest for attacking a wheelchair-bound girl with cerebral palsy, while he was protesting at a Laura and Jenna Bush book signing.
